message: Let's make a deal! This offer ensures you get something now, rather than risking a smaller share later due to inflation.
I think a more even split is fair, considering the inflation.  Let's both get a good chunk of the money.
Bob, time is literally money for you with this inflation. My last offer was very generous, and this one is my final compromise. It's a good deal for you if you want to secure a decent amount.
